text:
Kevin Hart made headlines almost a year ago when he was publicly and virally exposed for stepping out in his marriage to wife Eniko Hart.

Now that the scandal is behind him, the comedian is speaking freely about it and recently shared how his wife chose to forgive him during the trying time in their union.

In an interview with People, the Night School star said he is now a better man because of the cheating scandal heard across the web.

"I am amazing," he said. "I am amazing because I get it now."

The actor/comic, in the aftermath of the incident, took to social media to publicly apologize to his then-pregnant wife for what he called a "bad error in judgment." Fans may recall that this all came on the heels of Hart being exposed in a video, leaked by a former friend, which showed him engaging in sexual acts with a woman who wasn't his wife.

Two months following the frenzy, however, Kevin and Eniko appeared to have worked through it all and welcomed a healthy baby boy, Kenzo.

"The friendship that I have with my wife is insane," he continued. "Yes, that's my wife, we're lovers, it's a relationship, it's marriage... but the friendship we have is like no other."

He went on to acknowledge that their marriage "has been put to the test," before admitting that those said tests stemmed from "stupidity."

While continuing to shower his wife with praise for giving him a second chance, he credited her for upgrading his life in a way he claims he needed.
title: Kevin Hart Opens Up About Wife Eniko Hart Forgiving Him Following Public Cheating Scandal
